msg.msgText: "Connection" level monitoring data, can be obtained using the "imaserver stat Connection" command. The monitoring data is based on predefined queries. The queries that monitoring process uses to perform calculations and gather data, are cached and refreshed on a periodic basis. imaserver stat Connection <Options> SYNTAX: imaserver stat Connection help imaserver stat Connection "Endpoint=value" "StatType=value" "FilePrefix=value" EXAMPLE: imaserver stat Connection "StatType=HighestThroughputMsgs" The valid options are: Endpoint Endpoint name. If the Endpoint is not specified, all endpoint data will be returned. StatType The sort order in which results will be returned. Specify from one of the following StatTypes: The default StatType is "NewestConnection" NewestConnection OldestConnection HighestThroughputMsgs LowestThroughputMsgs HighestThroughputKB LowestThroughputKB FilePrefix The prefix of the .CSV file that the result is saved to. The file name contains the prefix, process ID, and timestamp. If FilePrefix is not specified, then the result is displayed on the console. NOTES: 1. Options are specified as "key=value" pairs. 2. All "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
